---
title: "About easytranscriber"
---

`easytranscriber` was developed by [Faton Rekathati](https://github.com/Lauler) at [KBLab](https://huggingface.co/KBLab). KBLab is a national research infrastructure for digital research and and development of artificial intelligence at the [National Library of Sweden](https://www.kb.se/eng.html).
